subTitle: Private content is supplied to the user's field of vision without being noticed by the platform operator. The procedure is similar to the reverse of ad-blocking technologies - instead of removing advertising campaigns from a website before viewing, private content is embedded on the user's side.

description.note: The procedure does not require getting used to new digital workflows. Existing or familiar workflows, such as the handling of the preferred social media application, remain uninterrupted.

general.title: Handling of personal data
general.info: Modern tools for collaboration no longer seem to be indispensable in private and professional environments. The self-determined handling and protection of our data as well as our privacy is perceived by our society as a prerequisite; however, in the digital world that surrounds us all, matters are pointing in the opposite direction. We lose the often believed guarantee of these characteristics by mostly using tools for free. In our social interaction, it is good manners to always use the latest and trendiest apps, but an important routine, specifically to question what exactly is happening with our data in the background, is becoming increasingly blunted.
